about.description:
Overlay remote repositories and/or files into the destinations
provided.

name: python-gilt

new_version_errors.1.2.3:
The recipe did not change in the version migration, a URL did not hash, or there is jinja2 syntax the bot cannot handle!

Please check the URLs in your recipe with version '1.2.3' to make sure they exist!

We also found the following errors:

 - could not hash URL template 'https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz'

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "python-gilt" %}
{% set version = "1.2.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e23a45a6905e6bb7aec3ff7652b48309933a6991fad4546d9e793ac7e0513f8a

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"
  entry_points:
    - gilt = gilt.shell:main
requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools
    - pbr
  run:
    - pbr
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - gilt

about:
  home: https://github.com/metacloud/gilt
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'gilt - A GIT layering tool.'
  description: |
    Overlay remote repositories and/or files into the destinations
    provided.
  doc_url: https://gilt.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
  dev_url: https://github.com/metacloud/gilt

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - knightdave
